required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety of Cetuximab and Trifluridin Tipiracil as the Third-line Therapy in the RASwt mCRC
clinical_study.official_title: Safety of Cetuximab in Combination With Trifluridin Tipiracil in the Third-line Treatment of RASwt Metastatic Colorectal Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: This was a single-arm, prospective study to investigate the safety of cetuximab in combination with trifluridin tipiracil (TAS-102) in the third-line treatment of Chinese patients with RAS wild-type mCRC.

detailed_description.textblock: This was a single-arm, prospective study to investigate the safety of cetuximab in combination with trifluridin tipiracil (TAS-102) in the third-line treatment of Chinese patients with RAS wild-type mCRC. Cetuximab will be administered at a fixed dose of 500 mg/m2 once every 2 weeks; trifluridin tipiracil will be administered in a dose de-escalation design: dose level 1: 35 mg/m2 twice daily on days 1-5 once every 2 weeks; after 1 cycle will be observed, and if ≤ 2 patients experience DLT, this dose level will be the recommended phase II dose; if ≥ 3 patients experience DLT, additional 6 patients will receive dose level 0. ( Dose level 0: 30 mg/m2, twice daily, Days 1-5, once every 2 weeks;) If ≤ 2 individuals experience DLT, this dose level is the recommended Phase II dose; if ≥ 3 individuals experience DLT, the study will be stopped.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From Baseline to primary completion date, about 18 months
primary_outcome.description: Determination of RP2D based on incidence of DLT

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Baseline to primary completion date, about 18 months
secondary_outcome.description: Participants With Incidence of Adverse Eevents During Treatment Period

arm_group.description: Cetuximab will be administered at a fixed dose of 500 mg/m2 once every 2 weeks; trifluridin tipiracil will be administered in a dose de-escalation design: dose level 1: 35 mg/m2 twice daily on days 1-5 once every 2 weeks; Or dose level 0: 30 mg/m2, twice daily, Days 1-5, once every 2 weeks;

intervention.description: Cetuximab will be administered at a fixed dose of 500 mg/m2 once every 2 weeks; trifluridin tipiracil will be administered in a dose de-escalation design: dose level 1: 35 mg/m2 twice daily on days 1-5 once every 2 weeks; Or dose level 0: 30 mg/m2, twice daily, Days 1-5, once every 2 weeks;

facility.name: Union Hospital, Tongji Medical College, Huazhong University of Science and Technology

responsible_party.investigator_title: Director, Head of GI Department , Principal Investigator, Clinical Professor
